attributes.action: For the people who voted to remain in the EU to grow up and accept the UK is OUT
attributes.background:
Suddenly as the UK all voted and we ended up leaving the EU the people who voted to remain now want a second referendum because they did not get their own way!
Grow up! Move on! Get on with your lives! We will not have a re vote until you get your way... Acting like children!

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134345
